borderWidth-default.$description: Default border width for most UI elements. Alias of borderWidth.thin (1px)

original.$description: Default border width for most UI elements. Alias of borderWidth.thin (1px)

borderWidth-default.name: borderWidth-default

borderWidth-thick.$description: Thick 2px border for emphasis. Use for focus indicators, selected states, or to emphasize important boundaries

org.primer.llm.rules: MUST use for focus rings on interactive elements. Do NOT use for subtle dividers.

original.$description: Thick 2px border for emphasis. Use for focus indicators, selected states, or to emphasize important boundaries

org.primer.llm.rules: MUST use for focus rings on interactive elements. Do NOT use for subtle dividers.

borderWidth-thick.name: borderWidth-thick

borderWidth-thicker.$description: Extra thick 4px border for maximum emphasis. Use sparingly for high-contrast focus indicators or critical visual separators

original.$description: Extra thick 4px border for maximum emphasis. Use sparingly for high-contrast focus indicators or critical visual separators

borderWidth-thicker.name: borderWidth-thicker

borderWidth-thin.$description: Standard 1px border width. Use for most borders, dividers, and outlines throughout the interface

original.$description: Standard 1px border width. Use for most borders, dividers, and outlines throughout the interface

borderWidth-thin.name: borderWidth-thin

boxShadow-thick.$description: Thick shadow (2px) used instead of a border for emphasis without layout shift

original.$description: Thick shadow (2px) used instead of a border for emphasis without layout shift

boxShadow-thick.name: boxShadow-thick

boxShadow-thicker.$description: Thickest shadow (4px) used for high emphasis borders without layout shift. Use sparingly for maximum visual impact

original.$description: Thickest shadow (4px) used for high emphasis borders without layout shift. Use sparingly for maximum visual impact

boxShadow-thicker.name: boxShadow-thicker

boxShadow-thin.$description: Thin shadow used instead of a border to prevent layout shift

original.$description: Thin shadow used instead of a border to prevent layout shift

boxShadow-thin.name: boxShadow-thin

outline-focus-offset.$description: Focus outline offset (-2px). Negative value creates an inset outline for keyboard focus indicators, ensuring the focus ring stays within the element bounds

original.$description: Focus outline offset (-2px). Negative value creates an inset outline for keyboard focus indicators, ensuring the focus ring stays within the element bounds

outline-focus-offset.name: outline-focus-offset

outline-focus-width.$description: Focus outline width (2px). Standard width for keyboard focus indicators to meet WCAG 2.4.7 accessibility requirements

org.primer.llm.rules: MUST use for all keyboard focus indicators. Required for WCAG 2.4.7 compliance.

original.$description: Focus outline width (2px). Standard width for keyboard focus indicators to meet WCAG 2.4.7 accessibility requirements

org.primer.llm.rules: MUST use for all keyboard focus indicators. Required for WCAG 2.4.7 compliance.

outline-focus-width.name: outline-focus-width
